reviews.title: Roll the Dice With the Swiss Cheese Box
reviews.text:
The box that Walmart ships the PS5 in is absolutely asinine. It has 2 decent size cutouts over the barcodes, which are literal holes in the shipping box itself. These holes expose nearby wording which identify the contents as a PlayStation. Luckily, mine was not stolen, but I was also home to receive it. 

Furthermore, either my courier thought the holes made great handles or the holes allowed the package to become snagged on something. Either way, not only was the shipping box torn open, but this also completely ripped up the bottom of the PS5 packaging.

I've never made a stink before, no matter how poor the packaging. However, when I spend $550 on a single item, I expect it to arrive protected....or, at the very least, in a box with all its sides. It's just common sense.

My mother gave me money toward this on October 16th, she passed on October 18th very unexpectedly. This PlayStation means a lot to my son, plus he works at Walmart! I can't believe I'm have this goose chase like this when I should be mourning my mother, not worried about if my son is going to get his PlayStation or not! I'll gladly change my review when I get the console!

reviews.title: Disc drive is not working right
reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and we got it within a week of ordering. He has only used it one day and when he went to put a disc in to play the disc drive sounded like it was a weedwacker/trimmer that you use outside to work on lawns. It was so loud. My husband and I tried multiple disc and it made that noise every time. After about 10 minutes or so it would stop but after some time it would start back up again. He had a disc in while he downloaded content for it and was playing a digital game and after about an hour playing the digital game the consoles drive started getting really loud again. We didn‚Äôt figured it was cause the disc was still in there downloading content, but all of a sudden the disc came flinging out of the console. I‚Äôm very mad about the fact that I‚Äôm paying over a $1,000 to Walmart for a console that was supposed to be brand new and it doesn‚Äôt even work right before we even get to use it. Now I‚Äôm probably going to have to call Sony and see if they will either fix it or replace it. There‚Äôs no point in having a disc version of a console when the console won‚Äôt even keep your games in it, and 90% of your games are on disc. Very disappointed and honestly don‚Äôt know how I feel about ever buying another console or video game system from Walmart again.

reviews.title: so far, so good!
reviews.text:
This is my second icemaker. The 1st one lasted almost 2 years, just 1 week shy of the extended warranty plan's expiration date. That almost never happens. I got lucky.

This one is better: I like the visible ice basket so I  don't have to open the lid to see the amount of ice. It has a suction cup to hang the scoop. It is faster at making ice. It's prettier. The ice falls from the center, so it doesn't seem to think it's full as fast as the one that filled from the side.
I know most machines are made by the same company but with different features and the same short life spans, usually 1 to 2 years. Always get the extended warranty on items like this. 

I got this one for $25  less than on Amazon and the 3 year Allstate plan for less than 1/2 the price of 2 year Asurion plan. Win! 

 I had really wanted a Smart ice maker this time, but I found with my 1st machine that using a Switchbot made setting a timer much cheaper, and it's Google Home Compatible. 

Clean regularly to make it last, esp with hard water. 5 to 1 water/vinegar.  I just started using descaling tablets or liquid to make this one last longer. Use filtered, spring, or distilled water if possible. 
Take the top off the machine to check for mold or scale every month, or if you see any specks in the water. 
Enjoy your clean Sonic ice!

reviews.title: A Journey in a Bottle
reviews.text:
From the moment I first encountered Giorgio Armani's My Way Eau de Parfum, I knew it was more than just a fragrance‚Äîit felt like an invitation to journey inward, to explore facets of myself I hadn't yet discovered. With each spritz, I'm transported to a world of elegance and wonder, where every note seems to tell its own unique story.

The opening is fresh and bright, with bergamot and orange blossom swirling around me like a crisp breeze on a warm day. It feels as though I'm standing in the middle of a garden in full bloom, the sunlight filtering through petals, casting everything in a golden glow. Yet, it's not overwhelming‚Äîthere's a softness that draws me in rather than dazzles me from afar.

As the fragrance deepens, the heart of tuberose and jasmine reveals itself, and I find it utterly captivating. These white florals dance on my skin, rich yet ethereal, making me feel grounded in my femininity without losing a sense of lightness. It's in this moment that I realize My Way is more than a scent‚Äîit's a reflection of who I am and who I aspire to be, graceful but unafraid, classic but always open to new possibilities.

The dry-down, with its soft cedarwood, warm vanilla, and white musk, lingers like a beautiful memory I can't quite let go of. It's warm and comforting, but never too heavy, staying with me in the most subtle, intimate way. I love how it feels personal, like it was crafted just for me, yet universal in its appeal.

Even the bottle, with its elegant simplicity, speaks to the spirit of adventure and self-discovery that My Way encapsulates. Every time I pick it up, I'm reminded of the journeys I've taken‚Äîboth literal and figurative‚Äîand those still ahead. In wearing it, I feel as though I'm embracing the world on my own terms, confident in my path, but always open to the beauty around me.

For me, My Way isn't just a fragrance‚Äîit's a reminder to stay true to myself while welcoming every new experience with grace.
reviews.author: emilie

reviews.title: Mad I didn't find this sooner!
reviews.text: This has got to be the best purchase that I've made in a long time. I have bought bed in a box type mattresses before, but never a hybrid where it contained memory foam and springs. This is for my sister who is 29 %26 6 foot tall, extremely lanky and has scoliosis in her back. She's been sleeping on a daybed for a little over six months now and at first she loved it, but eventually, the thinner mattress just wasn't cutting it. We tried buying foam toppers and eventually decided to just buy a mattress we could use without a boxspring to replace it. She has a developmental delay and will be with me as long as we're both kicking. She never really explained how bad the old mattress was hurting her but once I got the bed completely expanded and put on top of her bedframe I kid you not this girl was asleep within 20 minutes of laying down. A girl who usually stays up hours watching old reruns of her favorite TV shows. reviews.title: Paid for a 12-inch mattress but received a 10-inch
reviews.text: I'm rating 3 stars because even after waiting the minimum of 72 hours per the provided instructions, my mattress still didn't inflate to the entire 12 inches. It only inflated to 10 inches. It is now day 7, and the height of the mattress is still at 10 inches (please see pictures). I measured the mattress in all areas. I'm very disappointed, because I feel cheated out of my money. If this was the case, I should've been charged for the less expensive 10-inch mattress instead of the more expensive 12-inch mattress. Other than feeling cheated out of my money, the mattress is a pretty decent mattress for my 10-year-old. I'm unsure of how it sleeps, however, my 10-year-old hasn't complained. Shipping took only a day or 2, which was a pretty good turnaround. The box appeared to have once been glued shut because I noticed glue on the box once I cut the packaging tape to open the box. However, the glue was not in tact. It appeared to have been tampered with. Like the box was opened, and then taped back together to repackage. If that makes any sense. The mattress itself didn't appear to have been tampered with. It was compressed and sealed in the plastic. Overall, I'm disappointed because I didn't get what I paid for. I paid for the 12-inch mattress, but received a 10-inch mattress. Buy at your own risk.
reviews.author: TopNotchRN

reviews.text: This is a spring mattress. There may be some memory foam in there somewhere but really it's a spring mattress. The spring also mean that there is a sensation of being decoupled from the floor so while it is firm is doesn't feel supporting because there some lateral wiggling going on. We tried to like it for weeks but ultimately returned it.

reviews.title: affordable, comfortable gaming headset
reviews.text: I purchased two headsets because they only last a year for my son. I bought one for his birthday this time last year. He has a PS4 but he usually uses the headset when playing online games on his PC. I can't hear his PC and he can't hear me talking to him when he wears them. The mic is fine, too. This headset is a great value for most uses. My son does have a problem with audio bleed when playing YouTube videos in one browser window while playing video games in another browser window while using Discord chat. The others in the chat can her the singing from my son's YouTube videos but they don't hear the music. He has updated software. He tried plugging into different ports. He adjusted the volume on the video, the sound manager and elsewhere. If you are just listening to a video or using video chat or gaming, you should be fine. When you do several of these things at the same time, you may experience audio bleed. The headset is adjustable and comfortable even for my son's big head. The only other issue is that there isn't any website for the manufacturer to find troubleshooting tips. Since my son even wears out the more expensive headsets, we found these are comparable for a more affordable price.

reviews.title: It Gets the Job Done
reviews.text:
It Gets the Job Done, But Nothing Special
I bought this power bank mainly for traveling and daily backup charging. It works fine for the most part ‚Äî it charges my phone about 1.5 times on a full charge, which is decent but not amazing for the size. It's not the fastest when it comes to recharging itself either, so you have to plan ahead.

The build quality is alright ‚Äî feels a bit plasticky but hasn't given me any trouble so far. The size is pocket-friendly, which I like, and it's light enough to carry around in my bag.

Overall, it's an okay backup option, but I wouldn't rely on it for heavy use or long trips. If you just need something basic for emergencies, this does the trick.


---

If you'd like, I can tailor it to a specific model or your actual experience ‚Äî just let me know!

reviews.title: Bogus. Deceptive. False claims. 1/10.
reviews.text:
Bogus. Not even close to  20, 000mah light and flimsy Way too thin to have a 20, 000mah cell. after extraditing the cell from its case, three charge/ discharge cycles show 8500-9300mah. The Charging  board cuts out at 10-12 watts on electronic load. No "fast charge". no "Power Delivery". Also there is no thermistor on the pack, don't see pads for one either. 


Would not recommend. Will be returning the one I didn't rip apart to confirm these statements.

These issues were probably known by the maker. Do not buy this.

reviews.text: This TV arrived without adequate instructions.  Once plugged in, the voice guidance feature came on automatically and was extremely unpleasant. reviews.text: Let just start off by saying Walmart are cheating people out of their money. I never received the watch, so I cancelled the item . The item was supposed delayed because of the weather and then it was out for delivery and then I waited for it to be delivered and nothing was delivered. I received a email it was delivered with no proof of purchase. I contacted Walmart multiple times to refund my money and the watch is still not cancelled and I have not received my refund. So I don't know how the watch works
reviews.author: Samille

reviews.title: Never received the item but got charged.
reviews.text: I've had great success with Walmart in the past but this purchase changed my outlook completely.. I ordered an Apple Watch for curbside pickup. Right before I got to the store I received an email that the watch had been substituted for a different color so I was rightfully confused. I spoke with the employee working curbside delivery and confirmed that the watch was the wrong color so she advised me to cancel the order and then proceeded to walk back in the store carrying the $200 watch. Come to find out that the employee confirmed online that the watch had been delivered, which it clearly hadn't. I never accepted the watch and never once even touched the watch. I ordered a new watch of the correct color the same day, sitting in the parking lot after having cancelled the original order, and it was delivered perfectly the next day to my home and I'm very happy with the second order. Now, trying to get a refund for the original order, I've spoken to 8 different Walmart employees trying to rectify this issue, each of which tell me to speak to someone else and that they don't have the authority to help me. Yesterday, I went to the store and spoke to customer service who directed me to the pickup window. I spoke with the manager at the window and he advised me that he couldn't issue a refund for an item if it was not returned however I CAN NOT RETURN AN ITEM I NEVER RECEIVED. Tomorrow I will be contacting the local police to file a theft complaint against the store. $200 is not a brushover purchase for an expensive electronic item. As previously mentioned I've reached out to Walmart on numerous occasions trying to resolve this issue with no success. The most disappointing part of the story is that I'm a career fireman in the same town as the store I have a complaint against. Every day at work I'm responding to numerous calls for service at this exact store, aiding your customers, and ensuring that this particular store stays safe. This purchasing interaction is a complete breach of trust between myself and Walmart and I've extremely disappointed that this is where I sit after 2 weeks of complaints.
reviews.author: anonymous

reviews.title: WATCH STOLEN BY FEDEX BEFORE DELIVERED box OPENED

reviews.text: Do not believe them for price . Ordered and received May 30 price $189, very next day price was $169 called for adjustment store would not even pick up the phone and when they did  said I would have to return watch and redo it for lower price. Am unable to to disability they didn't care. called and talked to complaint depart and explained situation was told that they would deduct the $20. but not the tax part,, but would give me a $5. credit towards m next order.   this was on 5/31.  never did receive anything. they don't live up to price guarantee. this was less then 24 hours that the price dropped.

title: Beats Pill Waterproof Built-in Microphone Wireless Bluetooth Portable Speaker, Navy Blue
description: The Beats Pill Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker delivers bold, immersive sound both indoors and out, with upgraded acoustics including stronger magnets and an improved tweeter for louder, clearer audio. Its sleek, tilted design projects sound upward, while an IP67 rating ensures it's dustproof and water-resistant ‚Äî perfect for any adventure. With up to 24 hours of battery life, universal compatibility with Apple and Android devices, and a built-in microphone for calls, the Pill is designed to stay with you all day. It comes ready with a removable carry lanyard, USB-C charging cable, and quick start essentials.

reviews.text: The quality of the sound, design and functionality. The price point at 30 percent off reflected a reasonable entry point to a higher quality of a beats/apple sound product. Very pleased.
reviews.author: WalmartCustomer

reviews.title: Great Product!!
reviews.text: I absolutely love this Beats Pill waterproof built-in microphone wireless Bluetooth portable speaker. The sound is crisp and clean, the bass is exquisite, and it's definitely a value for the money. The battery life is great, and the elegant design and color pop complement every room in the house. I highly recommend this speaker if you are shopping for a speaker that is well worth the investment.

reviews.title: Good sound but annoyingly turns off unexpectedly
reviews.text:
I bought this speaker because I spend a lot of time outside by the pool in summer. I wanted a wireless portable speaker that would be okay if it got water on it once in a while. Plus, mine is pink: what's not to love!

It arrived in a box that had previously been opened, probably been returned, but in pristine condition. I charged it full, then went outside. After a while, it started to turn off on its own. I had to reconnect it to my device (iPhone 15 Plus) many times. Thought maybe it was the heat from the sun. Put it in the shade. It lasted longer, but it did turn off again. Did a hard reset. Kept it in a moderate temperature. Did it again. Read that it was a common issue with these speakers. I definitely expected more from this brand. Will ask for a refund.
reviews.author: Lara

reviews.title: WALMART WRONG ITEM DELIVERED AND POOR CUSTOMER SER
reviews.text: This review is not for the Beats Pill BT speaker‚Ä¶‚Ä¶because I received two kids pool rings instead. I understand mistakes happen but the discrepancy in price difference and items were unbelievable. I went to my local Walmart store and was told by the manager they cannot process the return due to not having the item in my possession. Again, the WRONG item was received. The manager then advise me to call the online orders department. They were not able to process an exchange or a return due to the discrepancy in the item that was received. At this point, I'm left with going around in circles on just wanting the item that was originally ordered and will most likely just take the loss due to this painful process of exchange/return.
